question: Which is the new Industrial corridor proposed to be set up by the Government of Karnataka?
explanation:
The Deputy Chief Minister of Karnataka has stated that an industrial corridor between Mysuru and Bidar would be built by the state to promote the development of industry and commerce.
The proposed industrial corridor would be in line with Bengaluru-Chennai and Bengaluru- Mumbai corridors. This project forms a significant part of the stateâ€™s target to make it a USD 500 billion market in next 5 years.
